summary: Life and events of the man who realized one of the most important discoveries of the 19th century: Altamira's caves.
cast: Antonio Banderas|Clément Sibony|Rupert Everett|Javivi|Irene Escolar|Pierre Niney|Nicholas Farrell|Allegra Allen|Lluís Soler|Tábata Cerezo|Golshifteh Farahani|Chantal Garsan|Concha Hidalgo|Katie Paterson|Henry Goodman|Maryam d'Abo|José Luis Esteban|Gonzalo Cunill|Ximena Vera|Kike Guaza|Tristán Ulloa|Carlos Camino|Javier Laorden|Dylan Moreno
title: Altamira
